content:
General
* The problem is too easy as a puzzle. You may re-create it as a clash of code instead.

Formatting
* Please study the formatting syntax on this page: https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement , and format your statement properly as described in the points below.

Goal
* Please format "N" as a [[variable]].

Input
* Please format "N as a [[variable]].

* Please delete "(1 ≤ N ≤ 10^9)".

Output
* Please delete "Contraintes".

Constraints
* Please format "N" as a [[variable]].

* Please change 10^9 to 100.

Stub generator
* Please add a write statement, e.g. write answer.

Cases
* Each test and its validator should cover the same scenario with slightly different inputs and outputs. Please revise all the validators accordingly.

* Please reduce the number of case pairs that use a 1-digit integer as input, and include more case pairs that use a 2-digit integer as input.

Thanks.
